American actor '''James Horan''' ([[14 December|December 14]], [[1954]]) voiced various characters in computer games based on [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s works.

==Voices==
* [[2006]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' - [[Boromir]]
* [[2004]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth]]'' - Boromir
* [[2003]] - ''[[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|The Hobbit]]'' - [[Smaug]], additional voices
* [[2002]] - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)|The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' - Boromir, [[Gimli]], and [[Farmer Maggot]].
